text: eheyin pratiksepa kalavun numbala (yuda bime) hamu vu vita (ovunge) gelaval vetata pahara denu. avasanaye numbala ovun abhibhavanaya kara gat vita yuddhaya tama ayudha bima tabana tek (ovun) grahanaya kirima numbala tadinma sidu karanu. eya pasu anugraha dækvimak ho vandi laba gænimak viya hæka. meya (allahge niyogaya) ve. allah abhimata karanne nam ovungen ohuma vipakaphalaya ganu æta. namut (ohu ese sidu nokale) numbalagen ætæmek ætæmeku visin ohu pariksavata pat karanu pinisaya. tavada allahge margaye ghatanaya karanu læbuvan vanahi ovunge kriyavan ahimi vi yannata ohu ida harinne næta
